modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "bcmBannerBrowser",
      "title": "Banner DB Browser",
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript",
      "label": "Banner DB Browser",
      "components": [
            {
                  "name": "ProductResource",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.bcmProductLookup",
                  "staticData": []
            },
            {
                  "name": "TableResource",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.bcmTableLookup"
            },
            {
                  "name": "RelatedTableResource",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.bcmRelatedTableLookup"
            },
            {
                  "name": "ProductFilter",
                  "type": "block",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "productSelection",
                              "type": "select",
                              "labelKey": "DESCRIPTION",
                              "valueKey": "OWNER",
                              "label": "Product:",
                              "sourceModel": "ProductResource",
                              "sourceParameters": {},
                              "model": "productSelection",
                              "required": false,
                              "placeholder": "Select product...",
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "onUpdate": "$TablesNGrid.$load()"
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "tableFilter",
                              "type": "text",
                              "label": "Table:",
                              "model": "",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "required": false,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "onUpdate": "$TablesNGrid.$load()",
                              "validation": {}
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "commentsFilter",
                              "type": "text",
                              "label": "Table Description:",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "required": false,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "onUpdate": "$TablesNGrid.$load()"
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "Objects",
                  "type": "block",
                  "label": "Product Tables",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "TablesNGrid",
                              "type": "grid",
                              "model": "TableResource",
                              "label": "Tables",
                              "parameters": {
                                    "owner": "$productSelection",
                                    "table": "$tableFilter",
                                    "comments": "$commentsFilter"
                              },
                              "allowNew": false,
                              "allowModify": false,
                              "allowDelete": false,
                              "allowReload": true,
                              "pageSize": 5,
                              "loadInitially": false,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "OWNER",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Owner",
                                          "model": "OWNER",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "TABLE_NAME",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Table",
                                          "model": "TABLE_NAME",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "COMMENTS",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Description",
                                          "model": "COMMENTS",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    }
                              ],
                              "onClick": "$ChildTablesNGrid.$load();$ParentTablesNGrid.$load();$ChildTables_visible=true;$ParentTables_visible=true;"
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "ChildTables",
                              "type": "block",
                              "label": "Child Tables",
                              "showInitially": false,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "ChildTablesNGrid",
                                          "type": "grid",
                                          "model": "RelatedTableResource",
                                          "label": "Child Tables",
                                          "parameters": {
                                                "parent_table": "$TablesNGridDS.selectedRecords[0].TABLE_NAME",
                                                "parent_owner": "$TablesNGridDS.selectedRecords[0].OWNER"
                                          },
                                          "allowNew": false,
                                          "allowModify": false,
                                          "allowDelete": false,
                                          "allowReload": true,
                                          "pageSize": 3,
                                          "loadInitially": false,
                                          "components": [
                                                {
                                                      "name": "CHILD_OWNER",
                                                      "type": "display",
                                                      "label": "Owner",
                                                      "model": "CHILD_OWNER",
                                                      "loadInitially": true,
                                                      "asHtml": false
                                                },
                                                {
                                                      "name": "CHILD_TABLE",
                                                      "type": "display",
                                                      "label": "Table",
                                                      "model": "CHILD_TABLE",
                                                      "loadInitially": true,
                                                      "asHtml": false
                                                },
                                                {
                                                      "name": "CHILD_COMMENTS",
                                                      "type": "display",
                                                      "label": "Description",
                                                      "model": "CHILD_COMMENTS",
                                                      "loadInitially": false,
                                                      "asHtml": false
                                                }
                                          ]
                                    }
                              ]
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "ParentTables",
                              "type": "block",
                              "label": "Parent Tables",
                              "showInitially": false,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "ParentTablesNGrid",
                                          "type": "grid",
                                          "model": "RelatedTableResource",
                                          "label": "Parent Tables",
                                          "parameters": {
                                                "child_table": "$TablesNGridDS.selectedRecords[0].TABLE_NAME",
                                                "child_owner": "$TablesNGridDS.selectedRecords[0].OWNER"
                                          },
                                          "allowNew": false,
                                          "allowModify": false,
                                          "allowDelete": false,
                                          "allowReload": true,
                                          "pageSize": 3,
                                          "loadInitially": false,
                                          "components": [
                                                {
                                                      "name": "PARENT_OWNER",
                                                      "type": "display",
                                                      "label": "Owner",
                                                      "model": "CHILD_OWNER",
                                                      "loadInitially": true,
                                                      "asHtml": false
                                                },
                                                {
                                                      "name": "PARENT_TABLE",
                                                      "type": "display",
                                                      "label": "Table",
                                                      "model": "PARENT_TABLE",
                                                      "loadInitially": true,
                                                      "asHtml": false
                                                },
                                                {
                                                      "name": "PARENT_COMMENTS",
                                                      "type": "display",
                                                      "label": "Description",
                                                      "model": "PARENT_COMMENTS",
                                                      "loadInitially": false,
                                                      "asHtml": false
                                                }
                                          ]
                                    }
                              ]
                        }
                  ]
            }
      ]
}
